DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy calcium carbonate fluoxetine treatment moderate severe PMS . Second , compare active agent placebo control . Third , evaluate efficacy treatment specific symptom cluster ( i.e . affective somatic ) . Fourth , determine whether addition calcium go fluoxetine treatment lead additional therapeutic benefit .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Fluoxetine , Calcium Placebo Treatment Moderate Severe Premenstrual Syndrome ( PMS )
DOC.detailed_description: This double blind , randomize , placebo control , parallel study randomize 60 woman Yale site treatment . Participants screen various collaborate ob-gyn center possible PMS symptom , direct referral community also accept . Subject participation length 7 month 6 schedule study visit . Methodology : After successfully complete screen qualification phase , participant randomize treatment Visit 1 5 cycle double-blind treatment . Participants evaluate monthly randomization phase adverse event , concurrent medication , primary secondary efficacy variable .
DOC.criteria: Female outpatient age 18 48 : Menstruating Meet criterion moderate severe PMS Report PMS symptoms least 9 12 month prior screen ; 4 ) *Are use adequate method birth control . Any candidate : Fulfills MINI ( DSMIV ) criteria serious AXIS 1 disorder Fulfills DSMIV criterion chart phase consistent diagnosis psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder major depressive disorder Has severe , coexist condition , investigator 's opinion , render patient unsuitable study Poses significant risk suicide Takes ongoing medication could treat PMS symptom Has history hypersensitivity adverse reaction fluoxetine calcium Is lactate , pregnant planning become pregnant course study .
